scenes.description: Pre-show lobby loop featuring the event title, attendance guidelines, and merchandise information.
Continuation of the pre-show loop, restarting from the main visual.

hololive 3rd Generation Live

hololive 3rd Generation Live
Operation Kyururun
~The Strongest Idols, You Have No Choice But To Support Them~

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 録音・録画・アップロードは禁止されています
subtitles.english: Recording, filming, and uploading are prohibited.

subtitles.original: スクリーンショットはOKです！SNSへアップして応援しよう！
subtitles.english: Screenshots are OK! Upload them to social media to show your support!

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Due to the nature of the performance, please be aware of flashing lights.
Cheering and shouting your support is OK.
